name: Hanoi Pickup from Airport
description: Are you feeling uncertain about transportation from airport, bus station, train station?We believe after a long journey, you deserve a warm greeting from Hanoi, not thinking about which taxi should I trust or how can I communicate with hosts/hotels asking for direction because the drivers can not find the place. It's the frustration and scam that kills your mood.We bring you comfort, relaxation and safety by picking you up from where you drop off, get you a ride, talk to you and we make sure you can get to the place as fast as possible.We also give you a free  Hanoi city paper map to explore the city.
